abstract.p: Book Review editors introduce Robert Pinsky review of Barbara Ehrenreich book Dancing in the Streets: A History of Collective Joy (S)

block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Calvin Trillin, the author of ''About Alice''; Liesl Schillinger on Martin Amis; Neil Genzlinger on ''Jimi Hendrix Turns Eighty''; and Dwight Garner, senior editor, with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus, the editor of the Book Review, is the host.
Featured Author: A retrospective on the career of Martin Amis, the author of ''House of Meetings.''
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''Inés of My Soul,'' by Isabel Allende; ''Exit A,'' by Anthony Swofford; and other books.
Links: Read reviews of the books listed in the Editors' Choice and Paperback Row features.
